FuncDef: This command enables large-scale NAT port forwarding actions.
CLIs: lsn create router <router-instance> [ b4 <ipv6-address> ] [ aftr <ipv6-address> ] ip <ip-address> protocol { tcp | udp } [ port <port> ] lifetime <lifetime> [ outside-ip <ipv4-address> ] [ outside-port port ] [ nat-policy <nat-policy-name> ]
lsn delete router <router-instance> [ b4 <ipv6-address> ] ip <ip-address> protocol { tcp | udp } port <port> [ nat-policy <nat-policy-name> ]
lsn modify router <router-instance> [ b4 <ipv6-address> ] ip <ip-address> protocol { tcp | udp } port <port> lifetime <lifetime> [ nat-policy <nat-policy-name> ]
